Title: Urgent Vehicle Recovery Request
Text: Visit Gramados Mail Service to collect an important mail regarding a stolen vehicle.

pages: Your expertise is needed to recover Mr. Robert Anderson's stolen UNU Mastodon Coupe. Use the information gathered from your recent conversation to track down the vehicle.

CompleteText: You have collected the mail detailing Mr. Robert Anderson's stolen UNU Mastodon Coupe. Use the information provided to track down the vehicle and resolve the situation.
